feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 7:32 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
